ayat.ayahEn: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ sent this ˹Quran˺ down on the Night of Glory.
And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is?

ayat.ayahArV1: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
ayat.ayahArV2: ليلة القدر خير من الف شهر
ayat.ayahEn: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months.

ayat.ayahArV1: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
ayat.ayahArV2: تنزل الملائكة والروح فيها باذن ربهم من كل امر
ayat.ayahEn: That night the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every ˹decreed˺ matter.
It is all peace until the break of dawn.
